objective:
Objective:

Learn how to improve accessibility by providing a meaningful label to a segmented button using the Invisible Text and ariaLabelledBy.
task:
Task:

You are provided with a segmented button that contains three items ("Map", "Satellite", "Hybrid").

However, it lacks an accessible name, making it unclear for users who rely on assistive technologies.

Set up a proper descriptive text for each item using the Invisible Text + ariaLabelledBy attribute.
instruction:
Instruction:

In the file /webapp/exercises/Exercise10.fragment.xml add the InvisibleText control and add the ariaLabelledBy property in the SegmentedButton control
howToTest:
How to test:

  • Use NVDA (Screen Reader) to inspect the Segmented Button. It should vocalize each item with its descriptive text.
helpCode:
//Take a look at sap.ui.core.InvisibleText control
<SegmentedButton
  id="idExercise10SegmentedButton"
  //Take a look at ariaLabelledBy association for sap.m.SegmentedButton control
>
  <items>
    <SegmentedButtonItem
      id="idMapExercise10SegmentedButtonItem"
      text="{i18n>Exercise10.fragment.segmentedButton.map}"
      width="100px"
    />
